channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - APIv6 BringYourOwnImage routes operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 23, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Mar 6, 15:16 UTC
Update - New start time : 23/04/2024 08:30 UTC
New end time : 23/04/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact : Some API calls definitely removed.

Mar 6, 10:57 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Feb 14, 00:54 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 19/03/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 19/03/2024 09:45 UTC
Service impact : Some API calls definitely removed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, this maintenance will enables customers to deploy cloudready images directly on their dedicated server.

The following API calls will be definitely removed:

GET /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

DELETE /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/bringYourOwnImage

Customers can still use the Bring Your Own Image (BYOI) feature from the API call POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start. More details can be found in the documentation page.
This change was required in order to add the new Bring Your Own Linux (BYOLinux) feature.
Bring Your Own Image (BYOI) / Bring Your Own Linux (BYOLinux), a comparison sheet - OVHcloud.

item.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated Servers] - IPXE scripts migration
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 16, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Mar 5, 23:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :16/04/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 16/04/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy about IPXE (open-source implementation of the Preboot eXecution Environment), the following API calls will be definitely removed: POST /me/ipxeScript PUT /me/ipxeScript/{name} Customers can still use that feature by using the "bootScript" key within the PUT /dedicated/server/{serviceName} API call: see documentation for more details.

Related Maintenance : Maintenance link
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive cooling system work on rack L115A13.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX7][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 15, 04:30 - 06:30 UTC

Apr 2, 20:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our storage and backups offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/04/2024 04:30 M UTC
End time : 15/04/2024 06:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI][Network] - background infrastructure operation

Start time : 04/04/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 04/04/2024 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Network automation will be paused for about 120 min during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for the management of the background infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][DedicatedServers] - APIv6 IPMI
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 3, 12:00 - 12:15 UTC

Mar 27, 23:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our "Dedicated Servers" offer.

Start time : 03/04/2024 12:00 UTC
End time : 03/04/2024 12:15 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to Bare Metal Cloud products to maintain consistency about APIv6 IPMI (Intelligent Platform Management Interface).

The following change will affect the APIv6 call POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/features/bmc/sshSol:
The optional parameter sshKeyName will be changed to optional parameter sshKey: customer will need to directly specify the public SSH key instead of the name of the public SSH key previously stored in /me/sshKey

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 24C12
item.description:
Apr 2, 17:56 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 02/04/2024 16:18 UTC
End time : 02/04/2024 17:54 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 2, 16:32 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/04/2024 16:18 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers in the rack 24C12 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 80A05/80A04/80A03
item.description:

Apr 2, 04:11 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 21, 21:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal offer.

This may temporarily affect Availability

Start time : 02/04/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2024 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks 80A05, 80A04 and 80A03 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1/GRA2/GRA3/GRA4][Dedicated Servers] - Boot Firmware Maintenance
item.description:
Apr 2, 09:33 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 2, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 26, 15:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

Start time : 02/04/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 02/04/2024 10:00 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance may affect reboots to disk or in rescue mode for servers running very old hardware
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our servers, we will be changing the boot firmware of legacy boot servers in GRA1/GRA2/GRA3/GRA4 from SYSLINUX to iPXE.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack GRA0311B03B
item.description:
Mar 27, 16:01 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/03/2024 13:14 UTC
End time : 27/03/2024 13:49 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack GRA0311B03B were no longer responding.
Root cause : As part of the electrical maintenance related to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/xvbl5bxqzrdw and despite the precautions taken by our teams, a manipulation has unfortunately led to the shutdown of the rack GRA0311B03B.
The issue was quickly resolved by our technical teams and it took a few minutes to have all the servers up again.
All impacted services are now operational.
